Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
EatScript = script:WaitForChild("EatScript") SpicyScript = script:WaitForChild("SpicyScript")
Damage = 25 ReloadTime = 2
Projectile = Instance.new("Part") Projectile.Name = "Projectile" Projectile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") Projectile.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Projectile.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Projectile.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Projectile.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.5, 1.125) Projectile.Anchored = false Projectile.Locked = true Projectile.CanCollide = true Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Head Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=169495579" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=169495589" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = Projectile
LocalControls = (Tool:FindFirstChild("LocalControls") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) LocalControls.Name = "LocalControls" LocalControls.Parent = Tool
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function PositionProjectile(handle, x, y, z) local HandleClone = handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * y local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * z local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * x return HandleCloneX.CFrame end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end local TargetPoint = nil pcall(function() TargetPoint = LocalControls:InvokeClient(Player) end) if not TargetPoint then return end Tool.Enabled = false local StartingPoint = PositionProjectile(Handle, 0, -0.4, -0.5) local Origin = (StartingPoint + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * ((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (Projectile.Size.Y / 2))) local Direction = TargetPoint local ProjectileClone = Projectile:Clone() local Mass = (ProjectileClone:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity) local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Mass, 0) BodyForce.Parent = ProjectileClone local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(9e+999, 9e+999, 9e+999) BodyGyro.Parent = ProjectileClone ProjectileClone.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or Hit == Handle then return end if Hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") or Hit.Parent:IsA("Tool") then Hit = Hit.Parent end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and not humanoid:FindFirstChild(EatScript.Name) then local RightArm = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if RightArm then local FoodPart = Projectile:Clone() RightGrip = Instance.new("Weld") RightGrip.Part0 = RightArm RightGrip.Part1 = FoodPart local Offset = RightArm.Name == "RightHand" and -0.2 or -1 RightGrip.C0 = CFrame.new(0, Offset, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) RightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0.125, -0.2, -0.25) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) RightGrip.Parent = FoodPart local EatScriptClone = EatScript:Clone() local Food = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Food.Name = "Food" Food.Value = FoodPart Food.Parent = EatScriptClone EatScriptClone.Disabled = false Debris:AddItem(EatScriptClone, 7) Debris:AddItem(FoodPart, 5) EatScriptClone.Parent = humanoid FoodPart.Parent = Hit.Parent Delay(1.5, function() if FoodPart and FoodPart.Parent then FoodPart:Destroy() end if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Health > 0 then local SpicyChance = math.random(1, 10) if SpicyChance == 1 then local SpicyScriptClone = SpicyScript:Clone() SpicyScriptClone.Name = EatScript.Name SpicyScriptClone.Disabled = false Debris:AddItem(SpicyScriptClone, 7) SpicyScriptClone.Parent = humanoid else UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if humanoid.Health == 0 then local Explosion = Instance.new("Explosion") Explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters Explosion.BlastRadius = 15 Explosion.BlastPressure = 0 Explosion.Position = humanoid.Parent:GetModelCFrame().p Explosion.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end end end end) else UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end if ProjectileClone and ProjectileClone.Parent then ProjectileClone:Destroy() end end) Direction = CFrame.new(Origin.p, Direction) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) Debris:AddItem(ProjectileClone, 5) Debris:AddItem(BodyForce, 2) ProjectileClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") ProjectileClone.CFrame = Origin ProjectileClone.CFrame = Direction * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) ProjectileClone.Velocity = Direction.lookVector * 125 wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end end
function Unequipped() end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent Character = Humanoid.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Food = script:WaitForChild("Food").Value Eat = script:WaitForChild("EatAnim")
Damage = 20
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player then Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then Character.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) wait() if Child and Child.Parent and Child:IsA("Tool") then Child.Parent = Backpack end end) for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") then v.Parent = Backpack end end end end
EatAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Eat) if EatAnim then EatAnim:Play() end
Food.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Food.Parent then if EatAnim then EatAnim:Stop() end script:Destroy() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent Character = Humanoid.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlayAnim = script:WaitForChild("PlayAnim")
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player then Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then Character.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) wait() if Child and Child.Parent and Child:IsA("Tool") then Child.Parent = Backpack end end) for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") then v.Parent = Backpack end end end end
--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent Character = Humanoid.Parent
SavedInstances = {}
function GatherAllInstances(Parent) local Instances = {} local function GatherInstances(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do GatherInstances(v) table.insert(Instances, v) end end GatherInstances(Parent) return Instances end
BaseColor = BrickColor.new("Really red") for i, v in pairs(GatherAllInstances(Character)) do if not v.Parent:IsA("Tool") and not v.Parent.Parent:IsA("Tool") then if v:IsA("BasePart") then table.insert(SavedInstances, {v, v.Parent, v.BrickColor}) v.BrickColor = BaseColor elseif v:IsA("CharacterMesh") then table.insert(SavedInstances, {v, v.Parent, v:Clone()}) v.BaseTextureId = 0 v.OverlayTextureId = 0 elseif v:IsA("DataModelMesh") then table.insert(SavedInstances, {v, v.Parent, v:Clone()}) if v:IsA("SpecialMesh") then v.TextureId = "" end local Color = BaseColor.Color local r, g, b = Color.r, Color.g, Color.b v.VertexColor = Vector3.new(r, g, b) elseif v:IsA("Clothing") or v:IsA("ShirtGraphic") or v:IsA("Decal") and v.Name ~= "face" then table.insert(SavedInstances, {v, v.Parent, v:Clone()}) v:Destroy() end end end
PlayAnimClone = PlayAnim:Clone() PlayAnimClone.Disabled = false PlayAnimClone.Parent = Humanoid
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 25
wait(3)
for i, v in pairs(SavedInstances) do if v[1]:IsA("BasePart") then v[1].BrickColor = v[3] elseif v[1]:IsA("CharacterMesh") or v[1]:IsA("DataModelMesh") or v[1]:IsA("Clothing") or v[1]:IsA("ShirtGraphic") or v[1]:IsA("Decal") then v[1]:Destroy() v[3].Parent = v[2] end end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
script:Destroy()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent
Spicy = script:WaitForChild("SpicyAnim")
SpicyAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Spicy) if SpicyAnim then SpicyAnim:Play() end
wait(2)
script:Destroy()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
LocalControls = Tool:WaitForChild("LocalControls")
LocalControls.OnClientInvoke = (function(Player) return ((Humanoid and Humanoid.TargetPoint) or nil) end)
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped)
